about_the_game:
Extreme Climbing Mirage City invites you to a unique and exciting climbing adventure set in the fascinating landscapes of the Baghdad desert. Equipped with 3D realistic graphics, this game is a climbing track game starring assassin characters. Extreme Climbing Mirage City, which stands out with its high-quality visuals and realistic gameplay, breathes a new breath into the gaming world.



The Main Features of the Game
Realistic Graphics: You will feel yourself in the game world with detailed and impressive landscapes of the Baghdad desert. Specially designed inspired by Baghdad, this game takes you on a magnificent journey.
Three Different Assassin Characters: Develop different strategies by playing with assassin characters, each of which has unique appearances. Do your time control well during climbing and complete the task as soon as possible.
Challenging Climbing Missions: Earn money by completing climbing missions filled with challenging trails and various obstacles. With these earned coins, you can buy different characters and make your character in the game look better.
Realistic NPCs and Animals: Visually detailed NPCs and animal models that add life to the game are waiting for you in the game.
Amazing Nature Sounds: Make your gaming experience even more realistic with environmental sounds and nature effects.
Time Limit: Test your skills by completing the course within a certain period of time. Each level is designed to be more difficult than the previous level. This is inspired by climbing simulator games, which makes the game more exciting.
Earn Money and Buy Characters: Unlock new characters and features with the money you earn by successfully completing tasks. In this way, continue this hungary with the assassin you want.
Risk of Falling from a Height: If you fall while climbing, your life will be reduced, and when it drops to zero, you will have to play the same level again. This is the same in our Extreme Climbing Mirage City game as in other parkour games and climbing games. Therefore, be careful not to fall while climbing and do your health bar check well.



Skills that Players Can Develop
Extreme Climbing Mirage City allows players to develop various skills:
Strategic Thinking: Improve your strategic thinking skills by planning the best climbing route.
Reflex and Speed: As in other parkour games, speed is a very important factor in this game. Increase your reflexes and speed by completing the tracks with fast and accurate movements.
Problem Solving: Use your problem solving ability to overcome obstacles and complete tasks.
Hand-Eye Coordination: Improve your hand-eye coordination to succeed on challenging trails.
Time Management: Gain the ability to use time effectively to complete tasks within a certain period of time.



Game Experience and Details
Extreme Climbing Mirage City is not just a game, but also a platform where you can improve your skills. As you progress in the game, you will encounter more challenging tracks and missions. The money you earn will give you the opportunity to unlock more assassin characters.

If you like 3D platform games and action adventure games, you will definitely like this climbing simulator game. This game combines the best features of its kind to provide an immersive experience.Dec. It is perfect for those who like popular game genres such as climbing game and assassin game. Our game also caters to various game categories such as Parkour game, action games and platform games. In this world full of game graphics and realistic sound effects, you will get stronger with each step as you climb to the peaks of the climb.

Why Should You Play Extreme Climbing Mirage City?
Unique Climbing Track: The climbing track has its own unique place among realistic games Dec.
Assassin Characters: Experience different game experiences with assassin characters, each with unique looks.
Realistic Gaming Experience: An unforgettable gaming experience with realistic graphics, nature sounds and impressive environmental designs.
Action and Adventure: This game, full of action-packed climbing missions and adventurous trails, will give you adrenaline-filled moments.

Play For The Best Performance
Extreme Climbing Mirage City is not only a game, but also a skill-building platform. Enjoy the fun while improving your parkour and climbing skills. Learn something new at every moment of the game and improve yourself even more. The coins you will get during the game will offer you the opportunity to unlock more characters. By completing the climbing trails, reach the highest points of the Baghdad desert.

In this impressive game, are you ready to feel like a real assassin and improve your climbing skills? Extreme Climbing Mirage City offers you an unforgettable gaming experience. Take the step now to climb to the top and write your own legend in this fascinating world!

name: Extreme Climbing Mirage City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Explore exciting climbing tracks in the Baghdad desert with assassin characters in Extreme Climbing Mirage City! This game, full of realistic graphics and challenging missions, increases the adrenaline rush. Start climbing now and write your legend!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
